title: Marquee QuickPoll
description: Marquee Quickpoll is a Goldman Sachs Web Application which allows a salesperson to send out Surveys to clients based around key market events.
responsibilities: Built out the frontend and backend components of the App.
Worked with the business sponsors to flesh out the app requirements.
Liaised with different departments like compliance, legal and helpdesk to ensure that all production rollout requirements were met.
technologies: Frontend Components - React, Reflux, ImmutableJS, Highcharts
Styling - Bootstrap, SCSS, CSS3 for styling the components
Testing - Protractor, Karma, Jasmine, PhantomJS and JUnit

title: Marquee API Site
description: Marquee API allows external clients use GS APIs as a part of their own applications by registering them using OAuth2 flow.
responsibilities: Built out the frontend and backend components of the App.
Worked with multiple teams to manage the development of the App.
technologies: Frontend Components - React, Redux using ES 2015 (Babel)
Testing - Protractor, JSDom, Mocha, Enzyme and JUnit

title: DASH/JS Build
description: Dash and JSBuild is a set of tools and frameworks which enabled developers to build their desktop and web applications in a fast and efficient manner.
responsibilities: Enhanced the capabilities of the core framework
Provided trainings to developers on the framework
technologies: Components - AngularJS, Bootstrap, RequireJS, Custom Gulp Plugins

title: UIToolkit
description: UIToolkit is a library to standardize the styling across all GS application and provide reusable themes and components.
responsibilities: Developed the first version of the toolkit.
Provided guidance to teams using the library.
technologies: Frontend Components - AngularJS, AngularStrap, UI Router, jQuery, DocPad and RequireJS

title: GS CDN
description: GS CDN is an internal content delivery network designed to serve static content in an easy, efficient and reliable manner. GSCDN served more than 5 million requests daily.
responsibilities: Designed, Developed and Managed the full framework which included apps to serve content, request content and manage it.
Managed the set of libraries served by GSCDN.
Provided guidance around use of different libraries.
technologies: Frontend Components - AngularJS, jQuery, VelocityJS and D3
Testing - Protractor, JUnit and Angular Mock
NGINX Plugins - C (Authentication and Authorization plugins)

title: Condor
description: Condor is a SOA based matching and alerting framework used for sending out GS specific research to clients based on their interest
responsibilities: Enhanced the platform by implementing different features.
Created APIs to provide the platform as a service.
technologies: Backend Services - Internal Framework based on Java

title: Goldman 360
description: Redesigned and Developed parts of Goldman's client facing web portal - GS360
responsibilities: Enhanced the styling of different parts of site using just CSS.
Worked on the Core Internal JS library.
Created a new Emerging Markets page.
Created a configurable panel to view GS Research as per interest.
technologies: Frontend Components - JSP, Internal Javascript Framework, ExtJS
Backend - Internal Framework based on Java
